name: n8n-nodes-base.itemLists
semantic_context: Helper for working with lists of items and transforming arrays

operation.name: operation

options.name: Concatenate Items
options.description: Combine fields into a list in a single new item
options.action: Combine fields into a list in a single new item

options.name: Limit
options.description: Remove items if there are too many
options.action: Remove items if there are too many

options.name: Remove Duplicates
options.description: Remove extra items that are similar
options.action: Remove extra items that are similar

options.name: Split Out Items
options.description: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items
options.action: Turn a list inside item(s) into separate items

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldToSplitOut.name: fieldToSplitOut
fieldToSplitOut.description: The name of the input field to break out into separate items
fieldToSplitOut.ai_hint: The name of the input field to break out into separate items

include.name: include
include.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldsToInclude.name: fieldsToInclude

values.name: fieldName
values.description: Specify fields that will be included in output array
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

fieldsToInclude.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

aggregate.name: aggregate

options.name: All Item Data (Into a Single List)

aggregate.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldsToAggregate.name: fieldsToAggregate

values.name: fieldToAggregate
values.description: The name of a field in the input items to aggregate together
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: renameField
values.description: Whether to give the field a different name in the output

values.name: outputFieldName
values.description: The name of the field to put the aggregated data in. Leave blank to use the input field name.

fieldsToAggregate.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

destinationFieldName.name: destinationFieldName
destinationFieldName.description: The name of the output field to put the data in
destinationFieldName.ai_hint: The name of the output field to put the data in

fieldsToExclude.name: fieldsToExclude

values.name: fieldName
values.description: A field in the input to exclude from the comparison
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

fieldsToExclude.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

compare.name: compare
compare.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
compare.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

fieldsToCompare.name: fieldsToCompare

values.name: fieldName
values.description: A field in the input to add to the comparison
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

fieldsToCompare.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

type.name: type
type.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

sortFieldsUi.name: sortFieldsUi

values.name: fieldName
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

sortFieldsUi.description: The fields of the input items to compare to see if they are the same
sortFieldsUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

code.name: code
code.description: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items
code.ai_hint: Javascript code to determine the order of any two items

maxItems.name: maxItems
maxItems.description: If there are more items than this number, some are removed
maxItems.ai_hint: If there are more items than this number, some are removed

keep.name: keep
keep.description: When removing items, whether to keep the ones at the start or the ending
keep.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

options.name: options
disableDotNotation
options.description: Whether to disallow referencing child fields using `parent.child` in the field name

options.name: Each Split in a Separate Item
All Splits in a Single Item

options.displayName: Ignore items without valid fields to group by
options.name: skipEmptySplitFields

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fieldsToSummarize.name: fieldsToSummarize

values.name: aggregation
values.description: How to combine the values of the field you want to summarize

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize. The field should contain numerical values; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored.
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

values.name: field
values.description: The name of an input field that you want to summarize; null, undefined, empty strings would be ignored
values.hint: Enter the field name as text

fieldsToSummarize.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

fieldsToSplitBy.name: fieldsToSplitBy
fieldsToSplitBy.description: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by
fieldsToSplitBy.hint: Enter the name of the fields as text (separated by commas)
fieldsToSplitBy.ai_hint: The name of the input fields that you want to split the summary by

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'splitOutItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldToSplitOut'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'splitOutItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'include'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'splitOutItems' AND include == 'selectedOtherFields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToInclude'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'aggregate'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' AND aggregate == 'aggregateIndividualFields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToAggregate'
IF renameField == True THEN SHOW parameter 'outputFieldName'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' AND aggregate == 'aggregateAllItemData' THEN SHOW parameter 'destinationFieldName'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' AND aggregate == 'aggregateAllItemData' THEN SHOW parameter 'include'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' AND aggregate == 'aggregateAllItemData' AND include == 'allFieldsExcept' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToExclude'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'aggregateItems' AND aggregate == 'aggregateAllItemData' AND include == 'specifiedFields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToInclude'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'removeDuplicates' THEN SHOW parameter 'compare'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'removeDuplicates' AND compare == 'allFieldsExcept' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToExclude'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'removeDuplicates' AND compare == 'selectedFields' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToCompare'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'sort' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'sort' AND type == 'simple' THEN SHOW parameter 'sortFieldsUi'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'sort' AND type == 'code' THEN SHOW parameter 'code'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'limit' THEN SHOW parameter 'maxItems'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'limit' THEN SHOW parameter 'keep'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'removeDuplicates' AND compare IN ["allFieldsExcept", "selectedFields"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'sort' AND type == 'simple' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation IN ["splitOutItems", "aggregateItems"] THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF aggregate == 'aggregateAllItemData' THEN HIDE parameter 'options'
IF /operation IN ["splitOutItems", "aggregateItems"] THEN SHOW parameter 'disableDotNotation'
IF /operation == 'splitOutItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'destinationFieldName'
IF /operation == 'aggregateItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'mergeLists'
IF /operation == 'aggregateItems' THEN SHOW parameter 'keepMissing'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'summarize' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToSummarize'
IF aggregation IN ["average", "max", "min", "sum", "countUnique", "count"] THEN HIDE parameter 'field'
IF aggregation IN ["average", "max", "min", "sum"] THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF aggregation IN ["countUnique", "count"] THEN SHOW parameter 'field'
IF aggregation IN ["append", "concatenate"] THEN SHOW parameter 'includeEmpty'
IF aggregation == 'concatenate' THEN SHOW parameter 'separateBy'
IF aggregation == 'concatenate' AND separateBy == 'other' THEN SHOW parameter 'customSeparator'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'summarize' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToSplitBy'
IF /options.outputFormat == 'singleItem' THEN HIDE parameter 'fieldsToSplitBy'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'summarize' AND /options.outputFormat == 'singleItem' THEN SHOW parameter 'fieldsToSplitBy'
IF resource == 'itemList' AND operation == 'summarize' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
